de.iabg.swing
Interface Loggable

All Known Subinterfaces:
MeshConnectionModel, MeshModel, ModeCorrelationModel, ModeModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMeshConnectionModel, DefaultMeshModel, DefaultModeModel, JMeshConnectionPanel, JMeshPanel, JModeCorrelationPanel, JModeCorrelationTabbedPane, JModeMirrorPanel, JModePanel, ModalAssuranceCriterionModel, OrthogonalityCheckModel, RigidMeshConnectionModel
public interface Loggable

This interface declares basic functionality for an object that can send log strings to registered listeners. The use of listeners allows a Logger to update the log by sending messages. Typically, a Logger will register listeners on a Loggable object and simply listen for string messages.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

Parameters:

fireLogChanged

void fireLogChanged(java.lang.String log)
Sends a string of the log to each listener. This method reports a string that should be handled by a Logger.

Parameters:
log - the string of the log

removeLogListener

void removeLogListener(LogListener listener)
Removes a LogListener from this object.

Parameters:
listener - the LogListener to remove
